main event: On September 15, 1953, multiple witnesses observed an unidentified object in the sky near Rapid City, South Dakota.
interesting points: The object changed color from red to white and yellow during observation., It was reported to be seen at two different times - first at around 1945 hours MST and again at approximately 2330 hours MST., Witnesses included civilians attending a meeting and people at a drive-in movie theater., Observers estimated speeds between 150 to 300 mph for the object., The sightings lasted for about 20 to 30 minutes before the object disappeared behind hills.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object that changed colors and traveled at high speeds
witness description: Civilians including a group of children aged 9 to 15 years and adults beside a drive-in movie theater.
